Text: Splitting the vol to Brazos and to BofA Cc discussed attached are the volumes to assigned to Brazos user Class A volumes column and BofA Class B volumes for Crescendo Gas Preston Oil and Preston Gas Please Brian Joan or me know if you have any questions JGM

Re Setup BrazosVPP Limited Partnership Cc what you need to be able to book the deals JGM Forwarded by Jesus MelendrezCorpEnron on PM Marilyn CT PM To Jesus NRON cc Subject Re Setup BrazosVPP Limited Partnership Jesus The Brazos VPP Limited Partnership record is in GCP The CP ID and BA ID is Let me know if you have any questions MC Jesus NRON PM To Marilyn CT cc Cheryl nron Amber CT Bradford CT Tim ProffittHOUECT Chris HerronCorpEnron Joan CT Subject Setup BrazosVPP Limited Partnership Marilyn In talking to Amber she said that you could setup entities that are affiliated with Enron Enron is the GP of Brazos VVP Limited Partnership and we need to setup as a counter party on the system to assign some trades It is my understanding that RAC Credit has approved Brazos Let me know if you have any questions Thx JGM

REpst Let me know what day works best for you My schedule is open in early Feb JGM Original Message From Kaminski Vince J Sent Thursday January AM To Melendrez Jesus Subject RE Jesus What about the first few days of February My last day is the st Vince Original Message From Melendrez Jesus Sent Thursday January AM To Kaminski Vince J Subject Do you have an opening for lunch JGM
